sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_58056_cat_tbl_var_catalog_table_template">
    <x_58056_cat_tbl_var_catalog_table_template action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <class_names/>
        <description/>
        <element_css/>
        <element_description/>
        <element_subtype/>
        <element_type/>
        <html_template/>
        <javascript_template><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading) {
        var tableSysID = "{0}";
        // Hide the result var element
        var ctl = null;
        var anchorElement = null;

        if (catIsDoctype()) {
            ctl = control.parentNode;
            ctl.previousSibling.style.display = "none";
            anchorElement = ctl;
          } else {
            ctl = control.parentNode;
            ctl.previousSibling.style.display = "none";
            anchorElement = ctl.closest("td");
          }
        if (!anchorElement || anchorElement.length == 0) {
            alert("Anchor Element not found");
            return;
        }

        var isCatItem = g_form.getTableName() != "sc_req_item" && g_form.getTableName() != "sc_task" ? "true" : "false";

        var ga = new GlideAjax("SCTblVarAjax");
        ga.addParam("sysparm_name", "getTableProperties");
        ga.addParam("sysparm_table_sys_id", tableSysID);
        ga.addParam("sysparm_is_cat_item", isCatItem);
        ga.addParam("sysparm_is_sp", "false");
        ga.getXMLAnswer(processAjaxResponse, null, anchorElement);
    }

    function processAjaxResponse(answer, anchorElement) {
        var scripts = ["x_58056_cat_tbl_va.moment.jsdbx", "x_58056_cat_tbl_va.bootstrap-datetimepic.jsdbx", "x_58056_cat_tbl_var.SCTblVa_DateTime.jsdbx", "x_58056_cat_tbl_va.SCTblVar.jsdbx"];
        var tableData = JSON.parse(answer);

        var table = g_form.getTableName();
        tableData.isCatalogForm = table != "sc_req_item" && table != "sc_task";

        if (tableData.status != "error") {
            if (typeof acn_sc_table_variable == "undefined") {
                ScriptLoader.getScripts(scripts, function() {
                    renderTable(tableData, anchorElement);
                });
            } else {
                renderTable(tableData, anchorElement);
            }
        } else {
            alert(tableData.message);
        }
    }

    function renderTable(tableData, anchorElement) {
        var instance = acn_sc_table_variable.buildTable(tableData, anchorElement);
        instance.initialize(newValue);
    }
}]]></javascript_template>
        <label_css/>
        <name>OnChange Catalog Client Script</name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-01-12 01:35:26</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>de680da2db230300768670adbf961909</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-06-01 22:03:59</sys_updated_on>
        <template_type>script</template_type>
        <x_58056_cat_tbl_va_ui_type>both</x_58056_cat_tbl_va_ui_type>
        <xml_template/>
    </x_58056_cat_tbl_var_catalog_table_template>
</record_update>
